import React from 'react' const Education = ({textColor,bg,main}) => { return (

Education

  • 2022 - 2024

    MCA

    Viva Institute of Technology

  • 2018 - 2021

    B.Com

    Viva College of Commerce

  • 2016 - 2018

    HSC

    Utkarsh Vidyalaya

  • 2015 - 2016

    SSC

    Lokmanya Hindi High School
) } export default Education
